author: Unreal Engine
description:
In this session recorded at Unreal Fest Stockholm, Mohamed Marouene of SoWhen? and Yuliya Gubkina from Flexis discuss methods for leveraging Unreal Engine for brand innovation, storytelling, and promoting products and services. 

Flexis has developed a brand to address issues related to the last mile of package delivery in cities, aiming to revolutionize urban logistics with its innovative electric light commercial vehicles and its B2B digital platform incorporated into the systems of the professional logistics operators.

To illustrate these concepts, the session focuses on this collaboration for creating the Flexis virtual universe. The session covers the integration of cutting-edge technology into traditional industries; cross-functional collaboration to achieve strategic objectives; rapid prototyping and iterative design in real time; implementation of a customization system for the universe; integrating MetaHumans to illustrate the human ecosystem; and the use of geometry scripti
title: Humans, Hardware, Services, and Realism: Flexis’ Logistics Story in UE | Unreal Fest Stockholm 2025

author: Unreal Engine
description:
This talk recorded at Unreal Fest Stockholm is packed with workflow tips and tricks for continuously optimizing AAA live games, based on lessons learned shipping Fortnite on Android and iOS.

We cover the utilities and frameworks needed to build effective workflows in your studio to keep the performance and memory of live games in check.

Topics discussed include a look at the replay system, low level memory tracker (LLM), some bits of Fortnite perf mem, Unreal Insights, native profilers, renderdoc, debugging common pitfalls, and more.

This talk provides a smorgasbord of utilities and tools which can be tailored to your studio’s particular situation.

Learn more about Unreal Engine here: unrealengine.com

#GameDevelopment, #DebuggingGames, #UnrealInsights, #UnrealEngine, #UE5, #UnrealFestStockholm
title: Workflows for Optimizing Live Games on Mobile | Unreal Fest Stockholm 2025
